title: Riot Please: Raptor Champion.
body:
-Scent Passive - Raptor gains 10/20/30/40/50 damage when an enemy is below 20% health.
-Tear through - Dashes to target Champion, dealing AOE damage and reducing armor by 20% - if enemy Champion is within 20 units of target; Raptor thrashes his tail wildly knocking away the nearest enemy champion to targeted Champion.
-Hunger- Raptor searches the ground for tracks, pausing momentarily. If a Champion has been nearby in the last 3 seconds their tracks are revealed and Raptor gains scent passive bonus damage for 7 seconds.
-Vicious Spite- Raptor; in his hunger for vengeance - gains bonus movespeed when low on health and his damage is increased by a percentage.
-Ultimate - Raptor roars attracting a team of Velociraptors, working as a pack Raptor gains 20 bonus damage for 20 seconds and his attacks slow the enemies 5/8/10/11/13%

replies.body: hunger for vengeance. I c what u did there. clever girl.

I just watched Godzilla and obviously we need a Giant Lizard Champion since we have a big Cat and an evolution monster (Gnar!). The Lizards in Zelda are a cool design; only able to be attacked from behind - maybe a slow moving but front defended Champion could add intrigue to the league.
